forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 49F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
